1101.description:
Each time you <color=#F48800>step on</color> the ducky square, <color=#F48800>a ducky will spawn</color> at the same spot the following round.

Note that other duckies can also trigger this effect!
1101.tips: Either run or go on the offense!
1101.title: About Ducky Squares

1102.description:
When a ducky <color=#F48800>catches up to you</color>, it will <color=#F48800>rob you</color> of a certain number of Duckie Coins.

Try not to have a ducky directly behind you!
1102.tips: It seems that something even more terrible will happen if a ducky steps on you...
1102.title: About Duckies

1103.description: <color=#F48800>Stepping on a ducky</color> will <color=#F48800>destroy</color> it and give you plenty of Duckie Coins.
1103.tips: Time to use your wits, or... wish for some luck!
1103.title: About Duckies

1104.description:
Every time <color=#F48800>a target square is completed</color>, <color=#F48800>a new target square appears</color> elsewhere on the map.

<color=#F48800>Complete all target squares</color> to clear the map.
1104.tips: Don't forget to bring enough Duckie Coins with you!
1104.title: About Target Squares

2101.description: There are <color=#F48800>terrain mechanisms</color> on certain parts of the map. Stopping on a <color=#F48800>mechanism square</color> triggers a <color=#F48800>terrain change</color>.
2101.tips: Keep an eye out for the map changes!
2101.title: About the Map

2102.description: Stopping on a <color=#F48800>game square</color> triggers a <color=#F48800>mini-game</color>. Play the game to win great prizes!
2102.tips: Stop thinking and rely on your instincts!
2102.title: About Game Squares

3101.description: Stopping on a <color=#F48800>mechanism square</color> causes the billboard vehicle to <color=#F48800>move</color>, thereby <color=#F48800>changing your possible routes</color>.
3101.tips: Keep an eye out for the map changes!
3101.title: About the Map

4101.description: <color=#F48800>Inside the park</color>, both the Admin and the duckies use the <color=#F48800>2x die</color> by default to move.
4101.tips: It's time to quack, quack, go!!!
4101.title: About the Map

4102.description: Stopping on a <color=#F48800>mechanism square</color> causes the rotating slide to <color=#F48800>turn</color>, thereby <color=#F48800>changing your possible routes</color>.
4102.tips: Keep an eye out for the map changes!
4102.title: About the Map
